said something about himself

My primary goal is to advance knowledge, particularly in the fields of Web Development, both backend and frontend. Currently, I fall in love with the MEVN stack and its simplicity, but I am opened to new adventures and different paths in my professional career.

My focus has been on the MEVN stack for the last eight months. On the backend, I am feeling comfortable with Node.js and NoSQL databases like MongoDB and Redis. On the frontend, Vue.js is my best friend also, having experience in both frontend & backend, I am already feeling very comfortable in using RESTapi-s

I consider myself as a creative and worthy person. I long for sharpening my skills in all kinds of fields. I am not afraid of new challenges and adventures. I am communicative and do love work in groups as one more way to learn new skills.
